description: The father of the victims, aged three, seven and nine, says their family will be "forever heartbroken".
title: McGinley children killed at home mourned at Dublin funeral
title_page: McGinley children killed at home mourned at Dublin funeral - BBC News
maintext: "We as a family are heartbroken. It will only be with your help, support and friendship that we will be able to patch our hearts together in some way, but we will still be forever heartbroken," he said.
